description: SelectBox component allows users to select from a list of options. Can be a single or multiple selection

variable_name.description: Optional variable name associated with a component
variable_name.title: Variable Name

items.description: Options for the select box. Can be a list of strings or integers
items.title: Items

value.description: Selected options for the select box
value.title: Value

multiple.description: Determines if multiple selections are allowed
multiple.title: Multiple

dense.description: Determines if the select box is dense
dense.title: Dense

outlined.description: Determines if the select box has an outlined style
outlined.title: Outlined

clearable.description: Determines if the select box has a clearable option
clearable.title: Clearable

disabled.description: Determines if the select box is disabled
disabled.title: Disabled

readonly.description: Determines if the select box is read-only
readonly.title: Readonly

color.description: Color of the range slider. Can be custom or standard Material color
color.title: Color

triggerEvent.description: Trigger event for when to trigger a run
triggerEvent.title: Triggerevent

title: SelectBox
